com.lucidworks.apollo.component

Class BufferingSolrServer

  • java.lang.Object
    • SolrClient
      • com.lucidworks.apollo.component.BufferingSolrServer

  • public class BufferingSolrServer
extends SolrClient
    Simple class that wraps SolrClient instance and adds a simple buffer on top of it. The life cycle of wrapped SolrClient instance should be managed elsewhere. You should properly shutdown this instance with a shutdown method.

    • Constructor Summary
